website_summaries.verdict: It's tough not to love this mini hot towel cabinet with its vintage 1950s appliance design.
pros: Small towel warming cabinet that you can store and use almost anywhere
Cabinet contains a full-size padded heating element to ensure that consistent heat is applied to all towels inside
Cabinet style maintains a consistent 150°F to 160°F
cons: not made for heating multiple bath towels

customer_reviews.title: Good for private use, but not for a busy commercial business
customer_reviews.text: I bought 7 of these for my massage business a year ago. They work well and get heavy use, but after a year most of them have started to crack around the door frame, and 2 have completely broken and needed to be replaced. I run a busy massage establishment, so they get used every day. For casual personal use, it should be a great product for the price (especially if you take care of it), but as a busy business it's not up to commercial standards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer is perfect for my small space. I am a manicurist and use it for hot towels, stones and masks. Can fit about 4 towels in at a time but I use a pretty good size fluffy towel
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this for home use!
customer_reviews.text: I saw my spa had one of these and I loved getting the hot towels after a massage. I was so happy to find the exact same one on Amazon. The towels come out steaming hot. It is big enough to fit 4 face towels and 2-3 hand towels at one time with room. If you put towels in slightly damp they come out hot, if you put them in wetter them come out steaming. I have had it a few weeks and no problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen E Carroll

customer_reviews.title: died at 4 months of very light use
customer_reviews.text: I have had for 4 months - I used it probably 4 or 5 times. Now it won't power on. Have contacted company multiple times - promised to get back to me with a solution. They have not gotten back to me.
customer_reviews.author: villageac

customer_reviews.title: Symptoms are worse first thing in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I experience blepharitis, which is inflammation of the eyelids, secondary to sub-optimal oil production. Mainstay of treatment is warm compresses. Symptoms are worse first thing in the morning, and by the time I make my way to the kitchen and warm a washcloth in the microwave, my eyes are already in misery. I keep wet washcloths in this device next to my bed so they are warm when I wake up and make opening my eyes and getting out of bed way more comfortable. Functions as advertised, no issues one month in.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great little towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great little towel warmer. Very small. Can only fit two plush hand towels in it. Otherwise maybe four thin hand towels. Heats up towels fairly quickly. About 30 minutes to an hour (not even) for wet towels. I have a tiny office/treatment room and was able to fit the towel warmer a slim line bookcase with doors so it’s out of sight.book case measure ms 13 inches from the wall and had to cut a hole in back of bookcase for the plug in order for it to fit. So keep the plug in mind when measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Hot Towels in 15!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I bought this towel warmer. It gets the towels hot within about 15 minutes, and it is small enough that I am able to keep it on my dresser. I use the warm towels for facials and relaxation, and this little cabinet does exactly what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for massage therapists
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for massage therapists. I load about 10 wet hand towels (2-3 per client), and one dry hand towel for the neck when supine. The heat is perfect to unwrap a towel just before applying to the clients feet. This is our second, and the first from about 2 years ago is still going well.
customer_reviews.author: KCoston

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware only 90 days warranty and must be in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware, inside of the packaging it states, if defective must be returned in the same box and packages; therefore, I have to keep this massive box in my apartment for 90 days and it won't fit in the closets nor under the bed. Worse the warranty is only for 90 days and I will be traveling this summer for 90 days. Says made in China. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Teal Green Heart

customer_reviews.title: THE DOOR, its noiseless to open and close, and more good stuff, read on !
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this warmer, 6 towels comfortably, keeps them hot if u pre-soak enough, warm if u dont, fits perfectly on a 6 inch wide shelf(north2south) and 12 inches (east2west) what I love best is as I'm in a service the door is easily opened WITHOUT any noise at all....love that and closes without any noise, love that more !
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little cabinet packs a powerful punch. Heats towels perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eva C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my mini cabi
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my mini cabi! It's so cute! It takes just a little longer to heat up but it has the perfect temperature once it does.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My warmer arrived today and it’s the perfect size! There are some discrepancies in the description regarding height. I needed something small to fit on my trolley and it’s the perfect size. The height measures just under 10 inches. Don’t know about the warmth but the size is amazing. Looks like it can hold about 12 facial towels when packed properly
customer_reviews.author: mekeda c.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: As described. Quick delivery. Small as stated. Easily holds 6 wash cloths , that is all that I have needed to use so far. It has room to hold more. Heats up quickly. Solid made. High;y recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Towel Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this at my barber shop for about 4-5 months now and it works great! Heats up cold towels fairly fast and keeps them hot. However, we typically only put 2 towels in at a time so not sure how it would do with more. I would say it could hold 6-9 regular towels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Atherley

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like it gets real hot. I'm a massage therapist and i heat the towels to put aroundneck and on their back during the session. They love it too. If any left at end of day, they go around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems very nice
customer_reviews.text: The Barber customers like the hot towel before a shave. This works great. I do wish it had a temperature gauge. There is only the one that its already set on. They are very hot when they come out, for sure! I wave them around for a few seconds before putting on the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if you want to wait an hour to warm
customer_reviews.text: Fairly dissatisfied on how it takes forever to warm my towels up. It has one job and it doesn’t complete it very well! I usually have to stick the towels or rice packs into the microwave first to get them to a decently warm temp and then I will put them into the cubby to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this warmer. It fits perfectly on a microwave cart in my small treatment room. I make epsom salt compresses for my clients and this holds the compresses and keeps them hot while I work, saving time running back and forth to the kitchen area for compresses. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie828

customer_reviews.title: HOT!!!  Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my nail salon and it is a great product except it has no temp control and the towels get really really hot. Like can't touch them hot. I usually just take out a couple of minutes before I put them on a client to cool them down a bit so I make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller office.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this towel caddy. This is dependable and heats the towels to perfection. I use this in a small home massage room and it’s perfect. Next month I’m moving into an office to double my clientele and I will be getting the larger size for sure. Also, it’s pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which are extremely hot but can easily be cooled by waving off excess heat
customer_reviews.text: Equipment exceeds all expectations, clients appreciative of the temperature of the towels, which are extremely hot but can easily be cooled by waving off excess heat.
customer_reviews.author: TUI

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. I have been a massage therapist for 20+ years and find that clients LOVE warm towels integrated into their massages. I typically warm three hand towels and 2 - 4 face towels. The size is great for that many and I could put more. The towels need about 20 min to warm but actually will get hot within 30-40. For multiple clients back to back, I would probably buy the larger model.
customer_reviews.author: Bio-SavvyLiving Sue

customer_reviews.title: I didn't really use mine very often, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really use mine very often, so I didn't experience any failure with it. I will say that it takes about half an hour to heat up. Keeping it clean was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Charlsie D.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok...
customer_reviews.text: Towels aren't warming as like before. Very small inside. No level control button for warmer towels... only off and on button. Not sure if I would recommend fully.
customer_reviews.author: AllNOne1

customer_reviews.title: Small & takes long to heat up
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small. Was only able to fit 6 facial towels inside correctly. After an hour the towels were only Luke warm and not all the way through, and yes I got them wet beforehand. Very disappointed in this item. I Sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the brand to get! I’ve used many over the years and elite is the elite!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for home use. Nothing is more refreshing than a fresh steamy towel. There is one heat setting, and it is hot! We have to flap the towels back and forth like a pizza until they are the right temperature. The unit is clean, and has no scent. the drip tray is undersized, and will overflow within 2 days, so be sure you check it often. All of the evaporated water that collects in the drip tray means that the towels also dry out within 4-6 days depending on how you fold/roll them.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Stead

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice, I like it, but an improvement it could use is...
customer_reviews.text: Love my warming towel cabinet, but I do wish it had a time of some kind of automatic shut off feature, and perhaps some kind of hinge that could allow you to prop the door open when you need to dry out the interior. It’s heats towels nicely is a very decent size and has come in so handy
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 2

customer_reviews.title: For use during facial treatments
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since February and have had no problems so far. Heats up quickly. Would hold 8 hand towels (probably) that are snugly rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a salon or to sterilize anything. I bought 2 for my new salon and Even after a year they are working just fine. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Riza khanal

customer_reviews.title: It is the best brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite towel Warmer. This is my second one in my spa. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Soohwa Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good value reliable heat.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a personal neck pillow to alleviate neck and shoulder strain. It is a small cabinet but fits my neck pillow perfectly. Gets quite warm. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Compact, heats well
customer_reviews.text: Heats towels to the perfect temp. Takes about 30 mins to heat up a cold towel- faster if they’re warm already. It fits 8-10 hand towels. It’s small, so it fits well in small spaces. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my towel warmer!!! Omg. I even take it with me for my traveling clients
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Take forever to get warm (NOT hot.)
customer_reviews.text: It took me almost two hours to warm up 4 regular towels (Just warm, NOT hot). I tried a few times and timed it before I decided to return it! I'm glad it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shang

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.....for a week
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a week, then just stopped working out of the blue. If you’re looking for a good, durable towel warmer, definitely look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This warmer heats up really fast! Too fast! ...
customer_reviews.text: This warmer heats up really fast! Too fast! Towels are dangerously steamy and I have to unroll it and quickly pass it from a two-pinched finger hold on one hand to the other so that it won't burn me. That said, I still use it and once the towel is cooler it's a relaxing experience for clients.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for at home business
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my home business. Fits about 8 hand towels and warms fast. I put in 2 towels before my 60 minute massage and was great temp when it was time to take out and wipe clients feet.
customer_reviews.author: Perpetua J.

customer_reviews.title: Spa quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good product! I’m a massage therapist and esthetician and have used this at spas and at home. It’s smaller but it works very well !
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: 7 uses and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This product has been used for 7weeks. One day a week for approx 4 hrs. Today it broke. Simply won't turn on anymore. I plant to contact Amazon about returning this product. It worked great 7 times but not worth the price for 7 uses.
customer_reviews.author: tammy c rushman

customer_reviews.title: It takes way too long to warm up. You ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes way too long to warm up. You have to wake up about an hour early if you plan on using it in the morning before shaving.
customer_reviews.author: EPS

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. They ask u to pay for shipment if u want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Aiqiong Lin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been saving up for this one! I absolutely love this towel warmer. It does get the towels well hot and you've got to be careful handling them when you remove them from the warmer. I use bathroom hand towels and it will hold about 6. It's perfect for my little space. Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HJM

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it that much but so far it warms up fairly quick and keeps my towels warm. Not overly hot like some I've used in spas.
customer_reviews.author: sandy klein

customer_reviews.title: Just keep it clean....it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's just like I thought it would be.. awesome!! Thank you 😊❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette M. Welonek

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged. Arrived very broken
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken in many places. I have one of these warm towel cabbies that I e used for five years and it's still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Krystee

customer_reviews.title: It is great for heating up washcloths to use on my dry ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great for heating up washcloths to use on my dry eyes!! It beats running to the microwave all the time...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rairden

customer_reviews.title: Hot out of the oven...
customer_reviews.text: I would've liked a thermostatic indicator, otherwise does as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Brockley

customer_reviews.title: Wash cloth not a face towel.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it would hold 12 hand towels but it’s more like washcloths. The product works well. No issue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Conduct

customer_reviews.title: leak
customer_reviews.text: Hello, it seems like a good machine, but it's leaking water everytime we turn it on. IS this normal?
customer_reviews.author: Sam K.

customer_reviews.title: Elite hot towel cabinet mini
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little heater. Only get 2 hand towels but it is the mini. Use to heat my wooden massage tools as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Heats pretty quickly. I use it for my mobile massage.
customer_reviews.author: cullen reavley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for BOTH types of facials.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Sits on my bathroom shelf. Perfect for at home facials as well as cleaning up after sex romps.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pony Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Alternative pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I had severe pain on my left side of my face, I was misdiagnosed for almost two month. The heated towels helped do much when the pain was severe and I still use it for comfort .
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Totally does the job of heating up my towels. ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally does the job of heating up my towels. It's small but I wanted something that didn't take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: snowboardchic99

customer_reviews.title: wonderful little towel cabinet
customer_reviews.text: wonderful little towel cabinet! Heats up moist towels very quickly, doesn't put off a lot of exterior heat from the cabinet. Will definately order a larger one of the same brand when my business grows. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi McPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It can only fit 3 moist towels. Small. At a time. So if you need more room, keep looking. But it works very well. And super easy to clean. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Therapeutic Massage by Heather

customer_reviews.title: How relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter...... She is a massage therapist and is always looking for ways to make her clients feel more relaxed..... This product should help her do just that!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it works super hot, other times just 'hot'. Guess your preference varies.
customer_reviews.author: Adrea E. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Small and Hot. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Good for home use. Heats up wonderfully. Maybe gets a little too hot but you just "shake" the heat out of the towel. Better too hot then not hot enough. I enjoy this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: nat20

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize how small it was, but if you are looking for a mini towel cabinet, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabbie
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabbie! Gets and keeps towels warm quickly! Would and did purchase again because my first one was burned in a house fire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small places!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small areas- towels are very hot- wished it had a temperature control. but too hot is better than too cold.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: This is a good towel warmer for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a good towel warmer for my needs. I give it 45 minutes to warm up. I am pleased with my purchase. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: and the hot towels give a nice massage effect
customer_reviews.text: I have it in my bathroom and have towels ready inside. I use it almost daily to freshen me up, and the hot towels give a nice massage effect. I use it for personal purpose at home.
customer_reviews.author: hari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome oven keeps towels really hot quite pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I work at Massage Envy as a massage therapist and I just had to have one of these towel warmers for my own home! They heat up quickly and keep that towels moist all day works great!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Takes about an hour to properly warm towels just right but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: keeps towels at nice temperature and holds 3 hand and 6 face towel ...
customer_reviews.text: Use for reflex clients, keeps towels at nice temperature and holds 3 hand and 6 face towel size easily.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size. Towels heat up fast. I usually do 6 hand size at a time and there is plenty of room for more.
customer_reviews.author: colleywog

customer_reviews.title: Love this towel warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Small footprint in my pedicure studio. Heard reels fast and hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Knight

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: Works very well at what it's supposed to de: get moist towels nice and hot.
customer_reviews.author: john altobello

customer_reviews.title: Choose this one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hot towel cabi! I use it everyday in my massage practice. It works great and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne F. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks a little cheap from the outside, but works great. Heats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small one person massage room! I bought a small microwave on here first but the door didn't fit tight and it made a racket when it was on! And you couldn't turn the dinger off! Thought this would use too much electricity to buy at first so I bought the microwave. But no problem to leave on all the time. But too many issues with the microwave, this is definitely the route to go. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Normal Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments I made!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 5 years and it's my favorite! This cabinet may be small in size but NOT in power, keeps towels nice and hot to use for my massage/spa treatments. Great for mobile use or if you're working with limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Char Sloan

customer_reviews.title: It's small to hold like 4-5 towels for shaves
customer_reviews.text: It's small to hold like 4-5 towels for shaves. could probably put more but don't need to! Very small and compact for a solo worker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits four folded hand towels that are pretty thick.
customer_reviews.text: I preheat towels prior to the massage but during the massage I can add additional towels and they heat up fairly quickly. It fits four folded hand towels that are pretty thick.
customer_reviews.author: candy Walter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right size for my business. Keep towels hot for shaving!
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought one for my home and it came packaged great, nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: This is the same brand we used when I went to school so I bought one for my home and it came packaged great,nothing wrong with it,the smell was a little off but i ran it for a little bit just to get rid of the smell and its fine.I love my cabby!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: Its just what I need for my business. It holds just the right amount of towels and its very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kreizenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size just what I needed holds about 6 hand towels.
customer_reviews.author: pinkheart05

customer_reviews.title: This was a great addition to my small office
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my small office. It heats up quickly and holds about 20 small 12X12 towels. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Rangel Fiacco

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this Hot towel cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this Hot towel cabinet. It is mini but works really well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Nino

customer_reviews.title: go for the larger verson for more space if you need it
customer_reviews.text: Personally, way too small for what I need and my practice, it was a good tester to first order and see how large it really is in person - however i did send it back and ordered the larder version. If you are gonna go for it, go for the larger one - its worth the extra money for the extra space
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin L.

customer_reviews.title: Love /not love it
customer_reviews.text: I have this and it heats the towles so fast and hot 🔥 only it runs out of heat quickley
customer_reviews.author: Carl Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs! It's smaller size works great in my small space. This was a great purchase and would highly recommend it for someone who doesn't need to stuff it full of towels as it only holds up to 6 folded hand towels.
customer_reviews.author: rysma

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective!
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is very small but perfect for my needs. It doesn't take up a lot of space, warms up towels to perfect temperature and a the price is right. I use hand towels in my massage practice. 3 hand towels fit without being rolled up. Might be able to fit 4 or 5 if rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Vega

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it keeps my wet towels nicely warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it keeps my wet towels nicely warm once I'm done with my clients massage so I can apply it to their back
customer_reviews.author: Tina g

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Small but works great! Exactly what I needed for my small salon suite.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berger

customer_reviews.title: 3 if you're good at rolling them tight
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Mini Hot Towel Cabbie for about 3 months now and it does not get as hot as it did the first couple of weeks. When I first got the unit, I'd have to take the rolled up damp towel out of the cabinet and shake the heat out of it before putting it on my massage client. Now: 3 months later, I have to warm it up at least 45 minutes before using the hot towels on my client in order to get a fairly warm. I would call this a warm towel cabinet not a hot towel cabinet. Also, it barely fits 2 hand towels. 3 if you're good at rolling them tight.
customer_reviews.author: debbersvm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size perfect for a small office. Heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: It came like they said in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: It came like they said in 2 days. And I used for the first time today. Its perfect!!! Heats up in 30 min. And Hot towels. My clients love It!!!
customer_reviews.author: monica morton

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: This product works just like the ones at the Barber Shop, in fact it is the same one used at my Son's barber. It is just a mini version. You can easily put 10-12 washcloths in it. I love to use it in the evening when I take my make-up off. It does take a least a half hour to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Towels are just right for me after heating for an hour or two. Seems over-priced though. If it lasts then worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles I.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cabbie! While it isn't as large as it's big sister, it does a fabulous job in my small facial room. Heats up quickly, keeps towels nice and hot and fits in the tight space I needed it to. It also holds plenty of towels (hand towel size). I have had 6 towels in with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me...
customer_reviews.text: Heats in a timely manner. Just enough room for my business. Lightweight enough to move from one location to other. Hot stones heat nicely in this little towel warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Palani Havellana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Small yet convenient. Works perfectly for in home massages or other esthetic needs. It takes about 20 minutes to heat up a rack full of towels. Start this process first!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chapel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the wrong Cabinet and I had to send it back. I ordered the larger size and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. O'Connor

product_meta.title: Elite Hot Towel Cabinet, Mini
product_meta.description: This mini single hot-towel-cabinet keeps towels warm all day long and can hold a maximum of 12 small, facial-sized towels. Maintains consistent temp of 150-160 degrees. Comes with water-drip pan and interior towel rack. For best results, use this hot-towel cabinet with small, facial-sized towels. Pre-soak the towels, wring them out, then roll them up and place towels on the wire rack inside the unit. When you turn the unit on, the towels will heat up. It is, along with our two other sizes (single & double), among our most popular and top selling hot-towel cabinets. Excellent quality, very reliable and reasonably priced interior dimensions: 10.5"w x 7 1/4" d x 5 3/8" h/ exterior dimensions: 13 3/4" w x 11" d x 10" h.
feature_bullets: Contains an internal temperature control so the unit does not over-heat
Insulated cabinet with padded heating element surrounds all internal walls for consistent heating
This unit does not rely on bulbs to heat which burn out and do not provide consistent heating
